Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 60th overall pick, by Houston in 1980...
Injured on 4/18/1980 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...

Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 3/2/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $600,000 per year...
